metadata.title: CVE-2014-5247 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The _UpgradeBeforeConfigurationChange function in lib/client/gnt_cluster.pyin Ganeti 2.10.0 before 2.10.7 and 2.11.0 before 2.11.5 uses world-readablepermissions for the configuration backup file, which allows local users toobtain SSL keys, remote API credentials, and other sensitive information byreading the file, related to the upgrade command.

criterions.comment: ganeti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
